document_data.caption: The Stop and its neighbouring areas.
document_data.name: The Stop
document_data.mainbody: '''The Stop''' was a farming village and renowned caravan stop between [[Hillsfar]] and [[YÃ»lash]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/State of Hillsfar|3-4}}{{Cite adventurers league/Quelling the Horde|6}}{{Cite adventurers league/Murder at the Stop|1-36}}
document_data.Geography: The cosmopolitan village was surrounded by several farms.
document_data.History: Many refugees from [[Phlan]] flocked to the hamlet following the [[Mulmaster]] food shortages. Only a few of the [[Red Plumes]] guard of Hillsfar ventured close to The Stop, and thus it was a frequent location for brigands to ply their trade. In this region, it was the most common place [[adventurer]]s were found, after [[Elventree]].
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: * [[Ymmeline]]: a [[Zhentarim]] agent looking for [[rust monster]]s that had strangely gone missing nearby the village.
